post.author: 이진경
post.content:
Microsoft CMS User Interface Developer



  The Company:

Navantis is a rapidly growing Web development company catering to a stable complement of Fortune 500 companies. In the past year we have been voted the Up and Coming Company of the Year (Branham Awards), one of Canada's 10 Most Innovative companies (IDC), and awarded Microsoft's Solution of the Year honours. Our dedication to excellent customer service and superior product development has allowed us to thrive even during this tough economic climate.

Navantis offers:

• An exciting and fast-paced work environment
• The opportunity to work on cutting-edge projects for top clients
• An excellent work environment
• The opportunity to continuously improve your skills
• A competitive compensation package

At Navantis there are no limits to your career development opportunities!

The Position: Microsoft CMS User Interface Designer

Using the Microsoft Content Management Server the User Interface Designer builds websites from conception to completion taking a multi-disciplinary approach which includes graphic design, information architecture, usability and coding.

The ideal candidate has solid HTML, MSCMS and Photoshop skills, preferable with at least two years experience working in a production environment.

Experience using MSCMS is a prerequisite. Strong visual design skills and a proven track record of building solid websites are also a must.

Being able to code ASP is definitely an asset, along with knowledge of advanced API functionality is MSCMS.


Skill Requirements:

•HTML, XHTML
•Microsoft Content Management Server
•Adobe Photoshop

Interested candidates should submit a resume and portfolio by email to userinterface@navantis.com.

www.navantis.com


Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Employee  

Contact Information
userinterface@navantis.com
Navantis Inc.
21 Randolph Ave., 3rd Floor
Toronto ON M6P 4G4
post.title: Microsoft CMS User Interface Developer
